name: Streets of Rage 2: The Simpsons Edition
overview: Simpsons Streets of Rage (Also known as Streets of Rage 2: Simpsons Edition) is a fan made wacky hack that inserts the characters from the popular cartoon TV series The Simpsons into the popular side scrolling beat’em up arcade game Streets of Rage 2. The game replaces 6 Streets of Rage 2 characters with Homer, Marge, Lisa, Bart, Mr. Burns, and Smithers. The rest of the game remains the same as the original game. Have fun!
